title: The UOC launches a guide to promote the use of Wikipedia in universities (Universitat Oberta ...
text: ( Source : Universitat Oberta de Catalunya ) Barcelona , 5 October 2015 . From today, university lecturers have at their disposal a Best Practice Guide to Use Wikipedia in University Education in their classrooms. The manual, available in
